author: Special Correspondent
text:
Industrial associations here should work jointly and continuously present to the Government the projects that are needed for the growth of the district, said C.P. Radhakrishnan, chairman of Coir Board.

The Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Coimbatore, and Southern India Engineering Manufacturers’ Association organised a felicitation function here on Wednesday for Coimbatore District Small Industry Association (Codissia). Codissia recently received the best district-level industrial association award from Foundation for MSME Clusters.

Speaking at the function, Mr. Radhakrishnan also said Coimbatore should get one of the defence parks planned by the Central Government.
title: Felicitation for Codissia
